item.title: Contact
item.description: This is an example of a custom shortcode that you can put right into your content. You will need to add a form action to the the shortcode to make it work. Check out Formspree for a simple, free form service. Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message

item.title: Publications
item.description: The latest publications from the lab. 2023 A mean-field model of glutamate and GABA synaptic dynamics for functional MRS Lea-Carnall CA, El-Deredy W, Stagg CJ, Williams SR, Trujillo-Barreto NJ. NeuroImage, DOI: 10.1016/j.neuroimage.2022.119813 2022 Loss of NF1 in Drosophila larvae causes tactile hypersensitivity and impaired synaptic transmission at the neuromuscular junction Dyson A, Ryan M, Garg S, Evans DG, Baines RA. Journal of Neuroscience, DOI: 10.1523/JNEUROSCI.0562-22.2022 A mean-field model of glutamate and GABA synaptic dynamics for functional MRS Lea-Carnall CA, El-Deredy W, Stagg CJ, Williams SR, Trujillo-Barreto NJ.
